name: Order of Rodentia - Idle Clicker
description:
EARLY ACCESS - Work in Progress


Order of Rodentia is based on a earlier project of mine turned to idle game. I've long been wanting to make a "forever" game, and I have a lot of ideas down the road for this one. Consider this version pre-pre-alpha. 

Controls: left mouse button

Note: Visual upgrades often come with speed bonusses.
